/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a few cars and buildings can be seen, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
